cyclone.name: FRANKLIN
cyclone.current_location: about 235 mi (380 km) south of Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic
cyclone.trajectory: moving west today then forecast to turn sharply north toward Hispaniola Tuesday, afterwards recurving north-northeast into the open Atlantic

weather_observation.watch_coast: Dominican Republic north and east coast from Haiti border eastward to Isla Saona; Turks and Caicos Islands
weather_observation.warning_coast: Dominican Republic south coast from Haiti border eastward to Isla Saona; Haiti south coast from Anse d'Hainault eastward to the Dominican Republic border
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Hispaniola (both coasts), Haiti, Turks and Caicos and adjacent Caribbean waters
weather_observation.wind: Low (â‰¤6%) chance of tropical-storm-force winds; gusty squalls possible as outer rain-bands brush the island
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected along the Puerto Rico coast
weather_observation.rainfall: Periods of heavy rain with 2-4 inches common and isolated amounts up to 6 inches through mid-week
weather_observation.other_hazards: Rough seas and higher surf may disrupt port operations and small-craft activity
